description: Stuck on meal ideas? This nutritionally approved satay bowl is just what you're looking for. It's ready in 20 minutes and perfect for lunch or dinner.
name: Satay Tofu & Rice Bowls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat rice according to packet instructions. Divide tofu, rice, cabbage, cucumber, edamame, snow peas and radish among bowls. Sprinkle with peanuts and onion, and drizzle with soy sauce mixture. Serve.
